greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Determinant of power series with alternate signs of gamma matrix with determinant 2!.
comment: a(n) = Determinant(A - A^2 + A^3 - A^4 + A^5 - ... - (-1)^n*A^n), where A is the submatrix A(1..3,1..3) of the matrix with factorial determinant
reference: G. Balzarotti and P. P. Lava, Le sequenze di numeri interi, Hoepli, 2008.
results.author: _Giorgio Balzarotti_ & _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 11 2009
ext: More terms, and offset changed to 1 by _Colin Barker_, Jul 13 2014
